channel.title: New server released Click here for details [317]
channel.description:
Features: PvP Features -PK following (Ranged, Melee, Magic) -MANY new emotes added. (Including Vengeance, GS, All GS specs and crossbow attack emote.) -Edgeville Wilderness, with a master portal added to teleport anywhere in the wilderness & in the game -98% PvP Armors and PvP Weapons with Special attacks and effects -Wilderness obelisks work 100% Vestas longsword has an amazing special - (Donators only) -The vengeance GFX is 100% animated. -All Godsword and SS gfx are 100% animated. -Perfect PvP Wilderness levels -Fixed dark bow spec -Alot of pkers in the wilderness -Great Combat system(And still working on more features) -Rune crossbow emote with dragon bolt special attack.
Player vs Monster Features -100%% Dagganoth kings with real like effects -Full Godwars Dungeon with Killcount and Real boss/minion Gfx and emotes -Metal Dragons -Slayer monsters who give good drops -Tormented Demon who drops Dragon claws -Kalphite Queen -King Black Dragon -Mithril Dragon -Chaos Elemental
Minigame Features -Barrows is fully working -Tzharr fight pits is 100% -63 wave jad minigame -Pest Control revamped -Assault minigame
Quest Features -6 Self made Custom quests -None of them are pre-made Delta quests
Skilling and Other Features -All Skills work like 80 - 100% -Slayer updated with player-monster task precision. -Website highscores to compete against friends -Every NPC talks (with up to 10 random dialogues) -Home is Varrock -Beginners do not lose stuff for thirty minutes. They cant trade or use the gamble chest for 30 minutes, either. -Relatively fast training (500xp/hit) -Wonderful staff -Gambling system - 50M, chances are 1/150 or 90M, chances are 1/750 -Money making can be a challenge. Find the right ways to be rich. -Characters show correct proportions in the equipment screen
For more details and infomation and download click here:
*

item.title: New server released Click here for details [317]
item.dc:creator: @drachtpkz123 drachtpkz123
item.description:
@drachtpkz123 wrote:

Features:
PvP Features
-PK following (Ranged, Melee, Magic)
-MANY new emotes added. (Including Vengeance, GS, All GS specs and crossbow attack emote.)
-Edgeville Wilderness, with a master portal added to teleport anywhere in the wilderness & in the game
-98% PvP Armors and PvP Weapons with Special attacks and effects
-Wilderness obelisks work 100%
Vestas longsword has an amazing special - (Donators only)
-The vengeance GFX is 100% animated.
-All Godsword and SS gfx are 100% animated.
-Perfect PvP Wilderness levels
-Fixed dark bow spec
-Alot of pkers in the wilderness
-Great Combat system(And still working on more features)
-Rune crossbow emote with dragon bolt special attack.

Player vs Monster Features
-100%% Dagganoth kings with real like effects
-Full Godwars Dungeon with Killcount and Real boss/minion Gfx and emotes
-Metal Dragons
-Slayer monsters who give good drops
-Tormented Demon who drops Dragon claws
-Kalphite Queen
-King Black Dragon
-Mithril Dragon
-Chaos Elemental

Minigame Features
-Barrows is fully working
-Tzharr fight pits is 100%
-63 wave jad minigame
-Pest Control revamped
-Assault minigame

Quest Features
-6 Self made Custom quests
-None of them are pre-made Delta quests

Skilling and Other Features
-All Skills work like 80 - 100%
-Slayer updated with player-monster task precision.
-Website highscores to compete against friends
-Every NPC talks (with up to 10 random dialogues)
-Home is Varrock
-Beginners do not lose stuff for thirty minutes. They cant trade or use the gamble chest for 30 minutes, either.
-Relatively fast training (500xp/hit)
-Wonderful staff
-Gambling system - 50M, chances are 1/150 or 90M, chances are 1/750
-Money making can be a challenge. Find the right ways to be rich.
-Characters show correct proportions in the equipment screen

For more details and infomation and download click here:

Read full topic
item.source: New server released Click here for details [317]
